mapper.insert: insert into coupon(coupon_number, coupon_name, discount, expiration_date, expiration_status) values (#{couponNumber}, #{couponName}, #{discount}, #{expirationDate}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from coupon where coupon_number=#{couponNumber}
mapper.update: update coupon SET expiration_status = 1 WHERE expiration_status = 0 AND expiration_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
